description:
Job description

Overview:

GrammaTech’s internship program offers students the opportunity to gain real experience in a friendly, open, and supportive environment. We choose projects based on real needs, and interns work closely with engineers to make sure that projects are completed successfully.

Location:  Due to the COVID Pandemic, managers may allow interns with the appropriate skills to work remotely but preference is our Ithaca, NY office.

Responsibilities:

Research projects at GrammaTech can take on a wide variety of topics and challenges. Projects focus on software assurance, software protection, reverse engineering, and software producibility. We do both static and dynamic analysis on both source and object code, in order to tackle serious problems with practical solutions.

Potential projects include:

Apply compiler optimizations to binaries. Develop some classic compiler optimizations on top of our IR.
Compile benchmark programs, design and run a large-scale Bug-Injector experiment
Web development of a reverse-engineering diagram viewer and editor
Improve precision and recall of similar machine code search, including feature engineering, run experiments to identify gaps, and implement solutions
Work on automatically injecting known bugs into JavaScript programs, i.e., building a JavaScript front-end for Bug Injector
Expand testing for vulnerability detection and rewriting for embedded systems. Set up sample systems, identify vulnerabilities, test if our tools offer strong protection.

Qualifications:

Required

Currently enrolled in a BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science
Excellent programming skills (C++, Java, Javascript, Python) in Linux or Windows environments

Preferred

Enrollment in a Computer Science PhD program

Job description

Join us for a unique 6-8 week internship in Japan that will offer you both personal and professional development opportunities. Experience working in a Japanese company that prides itself on cultivating an internationally diverse culture. You will work alongside our experienced Cloud Product Development engineers with a dedicated mentor. In the HENNGE Global Internship Program (GIP), you will acquire practical application development skills using Python and Go. GIP will provide hands-on experience using state-of-the-art cloud platforms such as Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Platform to develop applications. Japanese is not required as English is our primary language.

Internship Duration 
6 or 8 weeks (from 10AM until 7PM from Monday to Friday) 

Internship Slots 

Our Global Internship Program is open year-round and the internship slots are every two months.

Please check our website for the updated slots of 2021 batches along with our recent statement regarding the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic.

hennge.com/global/gip


Qualifications


At least second-year completed (Junior or Senior) or fresh graduate with BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or a related area of study
Experience in systems, software or algorithms
Knowledge of Unix/Linux environment
Proficiency with Python or Go
Familiarity with TCP/IP and network programming
Fluency in English (Japanese is not required)

Those interested in seeking a career in Japan will be at a significant advantage.

Benefits


Up to 150,000 JPY/month subsidy. HENNGE Global Internship Program is a training program without salary. The subsidy is provided to cover living costs such as meals, commuting expenses, and accommodation.
Round-trip airfare coverage
Medical insurance
Support for visa acquisition & full guidance for incoming preparation
10 free Get-To-Know-You lunches
Japanese cultural events
Monthly Technical Session: internal mini-conference where the engineers will share knowledge or recent trends
Refresh room & office parties


Residency Requirements
All candidates considered, including international students

Application Procedures 
The internship slots are handled on a first-come, first-served basis. Our team will review applications on a rolling basis and so it is in your best interest to apply early. There is no deadline for submission of the admission challenge, and time taken to complete it will not be considered in the application. Due to the time required for visa and internship preparation, we suggest you apply at least 3 months before your preferred slot.

Selection Process 
1. HENNGE Admission Challenge
2. Screening process
3. Online interview

position: Intern IT Security - for Hamburg’s first Unicorn company
description:
Job description

We are currently looking for an Intern IT Security who is eager to learn and join our Information Security Team for 3 – 6 months.

Our Security Team ensures that customers of our online shop have a safe shopping experience and their personal data is secure with us. In addition, the team also protects our corporate data and the hardware of our employees. Protecting customer and company information is an important part of our business and our team is passionate about bringing security to the next level. Our goal is to create a secure environment without restricting or slowing down business processes.

We are looking for an Intern IT Security who wants to start their career in the security field, is passionate to work on security-related topics and wants to build up knowledge in penetration testing, security monitoring, automation other topics.

What you will do

Assist the team in triaging vulnerability reports submitted through our bug bounty program
Investigate and respond to security incidents in our systems
Participate in employee security awareness training
Participate in penetration testing of internal systems
Improve our monitoring and scanning tools to detect security issues and automate routine tasks
Review and write security policies and guidelines

Who you are

You are curious about Web Application security and want to understand how things work and how to break them
You have some background in Computer Science, IT Administration and/or Security
You are able to write simple scripts and programs in any programming language
You like challenges, ideally you play CTF or solve hacking challenges online
You have good communication and presentation skills
Fluent English skills (spoken & written)

Benefits

Grow together with one of the fastest growing eCommerce companies in Europe
Flexible working times
40% discount on our online shop
Fresh fruits + drinks everywhere
Language courses (German & English)
Free sports courses & reduced price for gym membership
Subsidized public transportation ticket
Free choice of hardware and operating system (Mac, Windows, Linux) also for private usage
State-of-the-art tech stack running on AWS
Modern office in the city center of Hamburg
International working environment and English as company language
Company flats (subject to availability)
Agile work environment (MOVE) and cross-functional teams
Free access to Germany’s greatest developer conference code.talks
Company pension scheme
Free Laracasts and Egghead account 
Help in relocation and VISA process

We are looking forward to receiving your application – preferably via our online application portal! Thus, we can ensure a faster process and for you it is very easy to upload your application documents. :)
